guicassolato.java.n2w.converters

Class NumberToWord

  • java.lang.Object
    • guicassolato.java.n2w.converters.NumberToWord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILimitedNumberToWord
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DivisibleNumberToWord, UnitToWord, ZeroToWord

    public abstract class NumberToWord
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILimitedNumberToWord
    NumberToWord is the abstract class to convert integer numbers to their written form in English.
    Version:
    1.1 (2016-04-06)
    Author:
    Guilherme Cassolato, guicassolato@gmail.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NumberToWord()
      Simple constructor when later assignment of the number is desired
      NumberToWord(int number)
      Constructor method with variable initialization

      Checks number against the lower limit of the class
      void checkUpperLimit()
      Checks number against the upper limit of the class
      java.lang.String getLimitedNumberAsWords()
      Converts to words any non-negative integer number within the limits of the class.
      int getNumber()
      Gets the number which is intended to be converted to words

      Converts any integer number to words without limit checking
